title: S&P Global Get Fundamentals Input
description: Input schema for retrieving company fundamentals from S&P Capital IQ

company_id.description: S&P Capital IQ company identifier (CIQ ID)

start_date.description: Start date for data range (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD)

end_date.description: End date for data range (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD)

metrics.description: List of specific financial metrics to retrieve (if empty, returns all available). Examples: Revenue, NetIncome, EBITDA, TotalAssets, ROE, ROA
